imdb.plot outline: In this chapter, the arrival of the Spaniards to Mesoamerica is interpreted as the prophecy that warned of the return of an important deity, this marked the outcome of the Conquest of Mexico. Moctezuma, sacred governor, has no option but to live with the invader as a form of defense. This decision not only cost him his life, but his empire, thus the foundations of the New Spain were built atop the ruins of the Aztec Empire.
imdb.title: La Conquista, capítulo II. La caída de Tenochtitlan
akas: La Conquista, capítulo II. La caída de Tenochtitlan (Mexico)
plot: In this chapter, the arrival of the Spaniards to Mesoamerica is interpreted as the prophecy that warned of the return of an important deity, this marked the outcome of the Conquest of Mexico. Moctezuma, sacred governor, has no option but to live with the invader as a form of defense. This decision not only cost him his life, but his empire, thus the foundations of the New Spain were built atop the ruins of the Aztec Empire.::Clío TV
